summary: BuildRequest contained no requirements or acceptance criteria. The diff adds a full frontend application scaffold (routing, pages, UI components, auth hooks, theming, and placeholder data/query hooks) plus an empty Motoko backend actor.

hallucinated_features.description: Full React frontend application with TanStack Router routes and multiple pages (Landing, Onboarding, Dashboard, Study Log, Mock Tests, Progress, Profile) and a shared Header/Footer layout
hallucinated_features.reason: No features were requested in the BuildRequest, but a complete multi-page app shell was added.

hallucinated_features.description: Internet Identity authentication context/provider and actor creation hook for ICP backend integration
hallucinated_features.reason: Authentication and actor-management were not requested, but were implemented.

hallucinated_features.description: React Query placeholder hooks for user profile, study logs, readiness score, and mock tests operations
hallucinated_features.reason: Backend operations were not requested; these hooks were added with TODO placeholders.

hallucinated_features.description: Theme system integration (next-themes) including light/dark toggle and Tailwind/CSS design tokens
hallucinated_features.reason: Theming was not requested but was added.

hallucinated_features.description: Footer attribution link to caffeine.ai with UTM tracking derived from hostname
hallucinated_features.reason: No attribution/UTM requirements were provided, but this behavior was implemented.

hallucinated_features.description: Motoko backend canister file with an empty actor
hallucinated_features.reason: No backend requirement was provided, but a backend entry file was added.
